p.n: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Ernie Els
p.k: A look at the career of Ernie Els - the South African golfer has been a major winner four times - twice at the US Open and twice at The Open - across a glittering career

p.n: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Darren Clarke
p.k: As a child, Clarke longed to be The Open champion. As a veteran, against all odds, he succeeded. This is an emotional story of a golfer refusing to give up on his dream

p.n: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Jack Nicklaus
p.k: Chronicling the life and times of Jack Nicklaus, the Golden Bear, the American golfer who won a remarkable 18 majors during a glittering career at the top of the game
